name: Explore the 2nd Largest Karst in the world!
description:
Precisely in the north of Makassar, about 50 kilometers or 1,5 hours from Makassar, its name is Karst Maros pangkep.
So what’s the special thing? 
You’ve never expected that Karst Maros Pangkep is one of the biggest karst areas in the world, haven't you? And we’re serious about that! Its area lies in over 43,750 hectares. The uniqueness of Karst Maros Pangkep region can't be found in other karst areas in Indonesia , Karst becomes the second biggest Karst area in the world after South China Karst in Yunnan. Karst Maros Pangkep has been regconized as UNESCO world heritage site since 2001. Karts Maros area not only presents a unique landscape but also has archaeological sources of prehistoric caves and its heritage back to thousand years ago. We’re sure it’s a special place you must visit!
